content: Hello Mister Heine, my name is Bo Li from China. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in New York. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Bo Li from China

content: Hello Bo Li, it's a pleasure to meet you. I appreciate your interest in my apartment. The asking price for the apartment is 1,500 Euros per month.
name: Heinrich Heine

content: I agree to the price of 1,400 Euros per month.
name: Bo Li from China

content: Thank you, Bo Li. I appreciate your willingness to negotiate and accept the rental price of 1,400 Euros per month. I'm happy to have you as my tenant.
name: Heinrich Heine

content:
TERMINATE

I'm sorry, I have to look for a more affordable option. I'm a student and I have limited financial resources. I appreciate your understanding.
name: Bo Li from China

content: I see, Bo Li. I understand your situation, and I hope you find a more affordable option that fits your needs. Thank you for your time and consideration, and I wish you the best of luck in your search.
name: Heinrich Heine
